index.name: html
index.subtitle: HTML
index.about: HTML is the language that describes the structure and the semantic content of a web document. Content within a web page is tagged with HTML elements and these elements form the building blocks of a website.
index.description: Read the best free ebooks about HTML.

books.title: Swift Essentials - DZone Refcard
books.description: Get ahead of the fastest growing programming language. Swift is an open source, type-safe, object-oriented programming language that is used for more than client-side mobile apps. It is designed for developers to have an easier time writing and maintaining accurate code.
books.author: Alex Blewitt
